Hierarch Asterios:
Corrupting Darkness hardened inhabitants of the Colony of fairies. Cocoons, which they began to build, just huge.
But the strange thing is that the trees there hasn't changed a bit.
Say thanks to all the Fertilizer Timonial, which Hierarch of the fairies , Neeti Mymarid caring for trees.
Go to Naati Mymarid and ask little fertilizer.
